name: Ki Strike
summary: Your study of the flow of mystical energy allows you to harness it into your physical strikes.
description:
Your study of the flow of mystical energy allows you to harness it into your physical strikes. You gain the ki strike ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. The rules for ki spells are summarized in the Key Terms section on the monk class page, and the full rules for focus spells appear here.Ki Strike Leads To...

Elemental Fist, Sacred Ki
